title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, and accessing a URL, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: Instead, I expected it to return an HTTP error 404 indicating that the requested resource was not found.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 installation package from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL
4. Verify that the response is an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
